panel.label: Ban Residents
panel.name: bulk_ban_panel
panel.panel.string: Group bans not sent: too many Residents selected. Group bans are limited to 100 per request.
Group ban not sent: you do not have 'Manage ban list' ability.
Group ban not sent: your group have reached limit of allowed ban records.
Some group bans were not sent: [REASONS]
- The following resident(s) are already banned: [RESIDENTS].
- Ban limit reached, following agents not banned: [RESIDENTS].
- You cannot ban yourself from a group.
panel.text: You can select multiple Residents to ban from your group. Click 'Open Resident Chooser' to start.

name_list.name: banned_agent_list
name_list.tool_tip: Hold the Ctrl key and click Resident names to multi-select

button.label: Remove Selected from List
button.name: remove_button
button.tool_tip: Removes the Residents selected above from the ban list
